text:
How do I remove the styles option tab from this input?
{% text "url_custom" value="<https://url.com>", label="Href URL: Custom", export_to_template_context=True %}

To the best of my knowledge, you cannot disable the Styles tab. However, if you add the `no_wrapper=true` parameter to the tag, none of the styles will actually be outputted:
```{% text "url_custom" value="//myurl.com", no_wrapper=true %}```
If youâ€™d like to remove the styles tab or otherwise have more control over the editing experience, you may want to implement functionality via a module instead of a tag.
